resources.string: Please give your plant a name!
Please upload a picture of your plant!

Our product is meant to help you take better care of your indoor plants by measuring the humidity in the soil, the temperature in the room and the amount of sunlight reaching the plant. Remember, good living conditions make the plant happy.
Create a profile for your plant

You can either browse our plant list to find your plant and get the default niche for it or you can create a brand new plant with the conditions you decide on. You can always adjust the them from the settings if necessary.
Keep an eye on your plant
The application will let you know if the environment measured by the device is optimal or not for your plant.
Here you can see all your plant profiles nicely displayed in a tree-like shape. You can modify any detail about the plants you own or about your own info.
Click on image to edit profile picture
Registration successful, please check your email inbox for confirmation

Start adding your plants living conditions, by doing this you will see if the plant actual living conditions needs some changes.
Click button to find your plant living conditions
Click button to start adding your plant
Click here to see living conditions.
1. Turn the device on by pressing the button on it. A blue light will flash on the device when it\'s on.
2. Press the "connect device" button on the screen. This may take a few moments, so wait for the confirmation that the device has been successfully connected.
3. Put the device in the soil.
Please add a name for your plant
